alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 02 at 9:51AM CDT until April 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, minor flooding of low lying agricultural lands begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CDT Sunday was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 12.4 Sun 8 am 12.5 12.5 12.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1145 AM CDT.
